text:
Operated by a couple. Lady boss displayed an attitude ! So so fried mee hoon. Inconsistent ,can be very salty at times.
Heng Heng(store in front )selling the same stuff is better .

One of the better economical bee Hoon stall in Singapore. The white bee Hoon here is by far the best I have eaten! Side dishes are quite standard across the island. Price wise it is pretty reasonable at the time of posting this review. Stall owners are friendly.
Paynow/paylah accepted too üëçüèª

Lady wasn‚Äôt friendly. She wrapped the noodles without adding the chilli. When I asked for it she scolded me and said I need to tell her first before ordering (?) needless to say the noodles didn‚Äôt taste good after that incident.
Don't understand these stalls who offer "nasi lemak" but it's just steamed white rice. Even my 3 year old said "this isn't nasi lemak".
